SUMMARY: REQUIRED | OPTIONAL DETAIL: ELEMENT

wwutil.model.annotation
Annotation Type MaskMatch

@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
public @interface MaskMatch

Validate a String field matches the mask expression. digitMask is the mask character for matching any digit. letterMask is the mask character for matching any alphabet. anyMask is the mask character for matching any character. pattern is a the string expression contains the literal characters and the mask characters. 

 
 e.g. @MaskMatch( pattern = "(###) ###-####" )
 will match "(415) 555-1212" or "(408) 121-5555"

 e.g. @MaskMatch( pattern = "800-@@@-####" )
 will match "800-ABC-1212" or "800-EFG-4567"

 e.g. @MaskMatch( pattern = "800-***-****" )
 will match "800-A12-3[C?D"

 e.g. @MaskMatch( digitMask = '$', pattern = "## $$/$$/$$$$ ##" )
 redefine the digitMask to $ and will match "## 07/20/1999 ##"

Required Element Summary
 java.lang.String pattern
           
 
Optional Element Summary
 char anyMask
           
 char digitMask
           
 char letterMask
           
 

Element Detail

pattern

public abstract java.lang.String pattern

digitMask

public abstract char digitMask
Default:
35

letterMask

public abstract char letterMask
Default:
64

anyMask

public abstract char anyMask
Default:
42
